citeinfo.title: State Parks, Recreation Areas, and Waysides

pubinfo.publish: MNDNR - Division of Parks and Trails

descript.abstract: This dataset consists of three related feature classes: - A point file of State Park, State Recreation Area, and State Wayside Area locations, with centroids calculated from each unit's statutory boundary polygon. - Statutory boundary polygons of State Parks, State Recreation Areas, and State Wayside Areas. - Lands managed by the Division of Parks and Trails within these statutory boundaries (polygon layer).
descript.purpose: This dataset is intended to be used for reference purposes.

timeperd.current: Data are verified current as of the "Time Period of Content Date" given above and are updated regularly - collected legal descriptions using the best possible monument spatial information. As the Department's monument data become more accurate, spatial accuracy of this dataset will increase.

theme.themekey: boundaries, Statutory Boundaries, Management Units, Managed lands, State Parks, State Recreation Areas, State Wayside Areas

idinfo.useconst: Specific Constraint - This dataset is not to be used for legal representation and is a reference layer only. Use of the data are constrained by the DNR GIS Data License Agreement. See the Distribution Liability section below for a link.

citeinfo.title: bdry_dnr_managed_areas (Management Units - LRS, Stat Plan Areas - LRS)

cntperp.cntorg: Minnesota DNR - Parks and Trails, Information Systems Team

dataqual.logic: Data have been checked for consistency using ArcGIS 10 tools. Tests of Valid Values, General Tests for Graphic Data, Specific Topological Tests.
dataqual.complete: Complete over the area of the State of Minnesota

horizpa.horizpar: Data Source Accuracy: HUD = 1:100,000 to 1:24,000 GPS = +- 3 meters

procstep.procdesc: The original polygon data for statutory boundaries and managed lands within these units was gathered from the information collected by Teresa Thews, Real Estate Program Coordinator for Parks and Trails. With the help of Ron Danielson much of her information was moved to the developing Land Records System (LRS) administered by the MNDNR Division of Lands and Minerals. As annual Boundary Bills are passed in legislation the language will either add or subtract to Parks and Trails statutory boundaries. Once legal descriptions are entered into law, the documentation will be used in modifing the statutory boundary data within the LRS. The Division of Parks and Trails will continue to update managed lands data with new acquisitions and corrections as necessary.

attracc.attraccr: HUD data source: +-61 meters (roughly 200 feet) GPS data source: +-3 meters (roughly 9 feet)

enttyp.enttypd: Attribute table for Minnesota State Parks, Recreation Areas, & Waysides - Statutory Boundaries

attr.attrdef: Feature geometry.
Field alias: Unit Name. Name of state park, recreation area, or wayside.
Field alias: Unit Type. Classification of statutory unit (State Park, State Wayside, or State Recreation Area).
Field alias: Program Project Code. Division of Lands and Minerals program project code.
Field alias: GIS Acres. Acreage of statutory unit calculated from the Shape_Area field.
ESRI-calculation of the perimeter of the polygon in meters.
ESRI-calculated area of the polygon in square meters.
Unique identifier.
Full name of unit as formally defined in state legislation and maintained within the Division of Parks and Trails Enterprise Information System.

enttyp.enttypd: Attribute table for Minnesota State Parks, Recreation Areas, & Waysides - Points with Labels

attr.attrdef: Feature geometry.
Field alias: Unit Name. Name of state park, recreation area, or wayside.
Field alias: Unit Type. Classification of statutory unit (State Park, State Wayside, or State Recreation Area).
Field alias: Program Project Code. Division of Lands and Minerals program project code.
Field alias: GIS Acres. Acreage of statutory unit calculated from the Shape_Area field of the bdry_dnr_lrs_prk.gdb\dnr_stat_plan_areas_prk (Statutory Boundaries) feature class.
Unique identifier.
Full name of unit as formally defined in state legislation and maintained within the Division of Parks and Trails Enterprise Information System.

enttyp.enttypd: Attribute table for Minnesota State Parks, Recreation Areas, & Waysides - Managed Lands

attr.attrdef: Feature geometry.
Field alias: Unit Name. Name of state park, recreation area, or wayside.
Field alias: Unit Type. Classification of management unit (State Park, State Wayside, or State Recreation Area).
Field alias: Program Project Code. Division of Lands and Minerals program project code.
Field alias: GIS Acres. Acreage of management unit calculated from the Shape_Area field.
ESRI-calculation of the perimeter of the polygon in meters.
ESRI-calculated area of the polygon in square meters.
Unique identifier.
Full name of unit as formally defined in state legislation and maintained within the Division of Parks and Trails Enterprise Information System.

overview.eaover: In these attribute tables, field names refer to the actual names of fields in the table; displayed field names (aliases) are defined in the field definition where applicable.

distinfo.distliab: The Minnesota Department of Natural Resources General Geographic Data License Agreement is online: http://www.dnr.state.mn.us/sitetools/data_software_license.html
